dcterms:creator: David M. Blei
Andrew Y. Ng
Michael I. Jordan
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of 2,000 samples containing customer feedback with respect to purchases along with product characteristics. Each sample includes a combination of product and description categories, generating comments based on predefined bags of words.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset

dcterms:creator: David M. Blei
Andrew Y. Ng
Michael I. Jordan
dcterms:description: The PTS dataset contains 795 samples of customer feedback and ratings regarding purchases, with sector as side data. The comments vary in length, with an average of 10.6 words.
dcterms:title: PTS Dataset

dcterms:creator: David M. Blei
Andrew Y. Ng
Michael I. Jordan
dcterms:description: The WIP dataset consists of 3,451 samples of customer feedback and ratings, with sector and channel as side data. The comments range from 1 to 138 words, with an average length of 8.9 words.
dcterms:title: WIP Dataset

dcterms:creator: David M. Blei
Andrew Y. Ng
Michael I. Jordan
dcterms:description: The DCL dataset contains 5,427 samples of customer feedback and ratings, with groups of products as side data. Comments vary significantly in length, with an average of 61.7 words.
dcterms:title: DCL Dataset

dcterms:creator: David M. Blei
Andrew Y. Ng
Michael I. Jordan
dcterms:description: The RR dataset consists of 100,000 samples of customer feedback, with various categories as side data. The comments range from 1 to 418 words, with an average length of 69.5 words.
dcterms:title: RR Dataset
